title: ICT-Enhanced Constructivist Teaching Methods Training Program for K-12 Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Foundational Pedagogy and Science Education
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to explore ICT tools and constructivist learning strategies applicable in K-12 educational settings

learning_goals: Learners will apply three or more ICT tools for designing science lessons based on constructivist learning principles.
Learners will explain a five-step process for designing digital learning environments that promote student-centered inquiry activities.
Learners will develop and implement a blended learning model integrating online collaboration platforms with offline activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
